presentation\/index.md.Jeedom est un logiciel Open-Source gratu: Jeedom is free open-source software that can be installed on any Linux system
presentation\/index.md.Il est basé sur un noyau avec de multipl: It is based on a kernel with multiple functionalities
presentation\/index.md.gestion de scénarios, interaction avec l: scenario management, textual and sound interaction with the home automation installation, visualization of histories and generation of curves and graphics, linking of all equipment and connected objects, customization of the interface ... Its clear interface and intuitive allows you to set up a complete solution without development knowledge
presentation\/index.md.Jeedom ne nécessite pas l'accès à des se: Jeedom does not require access to external servers to operate
presentation\/index.md.Toute votre installation se gère en loca: Your entire installation is managed locally and you are therefore the only ones who have access to it to guarantee complete confidentiality
presentation\/index.md.Grâce à sa flexibilité et aux nombreux p: Thanks to its flexibility and numerous customization parameters, each user can create their own Jeedom home automation
presentation\/index.md.A l'aide des widgets, des vues et des de: Using widgets, views and designs, you have complete freedom to imagine your own interface if you wish
presentation\/index.md.Gérer la sécurité des biens et des perso: Manage the security of goods and people
presentation\/index.md.Automatiser le chauffage pour un meilleu: Automate heating for better comfort and energy savings
presentation\/index.md.Visualiser et gérer la consommation éner: Visualize and manage energy consumption, to anticipate expenditure and reduce consumption
presentation\/index.md.Communiquer par la voix, des SMS, des ma: Communicate by voice, SMS, emails or mobile applications
presentation\/index.md.Gérer tous les automatismes de la maison: Manage all the automations in the house, shutters, gate, lights, etc
presentation\/index.md.Gérer ses périphériques multimédia audio: Manage audio and video multimedia devices, and connected objects
presentation\/index.md.Jeedom repose sur le Core (le noyau), em: Jeedom is based on the Core, embedding the structure and central functions
presentation\/index.md.Les équipements, comprenant des actionne: Equipment, including actuators or sensors, is organized by objects
presentation\/index.md.Les objets peuvent, par exemple, représe: Objects can, for example, represent physical parts
presentation\/index.md.Toutes les informations sont historisabl: All the information can be historized (temperature curves, consumption, door openings, etc.), and accessible in Analysis → History or from the Dashboard tiles
presentation\/index.md.Les scénarios permettent d'automatiser t: Scenarios allow you to automate all or part of your equipment
presentation\/index.md.Ils sont construits avec différents bloc: They are built with different blocks
presentation\/index.md.Des blocs conditionnels (Si, Alors, Sino: Conditional blocks (If, Then, Else), actions, programming (IN x minutes or A hhmm), loop, comment, or php code
presentation\/index.md.Tous les blocs sont imbricables les uns: All blocks are nestable into each other, offering endless possibilities
presentation\/index.md.Jeedom propose un moteur de création de: Jeedom offers a Widget creation engine for equipment orders
presentation\/index.md.Vous pouvez ainsi créer vos propres Widg: You can thus create your own Widgets, in addition to the basic Widgets
presentation\/index.md.La création de Widgets est aussi possibl: Widgets can also be created directly from code, for advanced users
presentation\/index.md.Le système d'interaction dans Jeedom per: The interaction system in Jeedom allows you to perform actions from text or voice commands
presentation\/index.md.Le centre de mise à jour permet de mettr: The update center allows you to update all of Jeedom's functionality, including the core software and its plugins
presentation\/index.md.D'autres fonctions de gestion des extens: Other extension management functions are available (delete, reinstall, check, etc
presentation\/index.md.Autour de ce noyau viennent se greffer d: Around this core are plugins, which can be of all kinds
presentation\/index.md.Ces plugins peuvent être installés depui: These plugins can be installed from the Market and allow you to extend the possibilities of Jeedom
presentation\/index.md.Jeedom permet à n'importe quel plugin de: Jeedom allows any plugin to chat with another on a standardized basis
presentation\/index.md.Cela permet par exemple d'utiliser les p: This makes it possible, for example, to use thermostat or alarm plugins with any home automation protocol or even an IP plugin or communicating object
